## Nutrient cycles: Ecosystem
<hr>
<br />
<br />

<div style="float: left; width: 40%;">

* **Entry of nutrients into system**
    + fixation (bacteria)
    + weathering (rocks)
    + deposition (acid rain)

<br />

* **Internal transfer (recycling)**
    + food webs
    + decomposition
 
 <br />
 
* **Loss of nutrients from system**

</div>
